Bolognese

Bolognese

Ingredients

  1. Ground Beef/Turkey
  2. Pasta (and pasta water)
  3. Diced vegetables for base
    • Onions
    • Carrots (optional)
    • Celery (optional)
  4. Tomato sauce base
    • Tomato paste
    • Tomato sauce (bottled)
    • Tomatoes (canned or blended)
  5. Salt, Pepper, Chilli flakes
  6. Mushrooms (optional)
  7. Basil (optional)

Instructions

  1. Cook all of the vegetables in a pot, in the following order:
    • Carrots/Celery
    • Onions
  2. In a separate pan, cook the ground meat until deep brown
  3. Boil the pasta and when finishing
    • Save at least 1 cup of the past water
    • Toss the cooked pasta in oil to avoid sticking
  4. Mix all of the following together into the pot
    • Vegetables
    • Browned meat
    • Tomato sauce base ingredients(3)
    • Pasta water
  5. Reduce the mix and continue to add water until cooked
  6. When almost finished add the following in order:
    • Mushrooms
    • Basil
